ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Permission.Bypass_Validation_Rule), ISCHANGED(StageName), TEXT(StageName) <> "Closed Lost", TEXT(StageName) <> "Salesforce Correction", TEXT(StageName) <> "0 - Disqualified", CASE(TEXT(StageName), "0 - Meeting Pending", 1, "0 - Meeting Scheduled", 2, "0 - Meeting Occurred", 3, "1 - Discovery", 4, "2 - Demo", 5, "3 - Solution Design & Evaluation", 6, "4 - Negotiation", 7, "Closed Won", 8, 0) <> CASE(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "0 - Meeting Pending", 1, "0 - Meeting Scheduled", 2, "0 - Meeting Occurred", 3, "1 - Discovery", 4, "2 - Demo", 5, "3 - Solution Design & Evaluation", 6, "4 - Negotiation", 7, "Closed Won", 8, 0 ) + 1 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Stages must be completed in order.
